item_category: Upgrade to the latest experience with Nokia 1.3, using AI features for an advanced smartphone experience. Capture incredible photos using the cameras with low light enhancement and AI imaging, and watch all your videos in HDR on the 5.71" display. The dedicated Google Assistant button allows you to open apps, find routes, or connect with friends, all at the touch of a button. Plus, it all runs smoothly on Android 10 (Go edition) software, ready for Android 11 (Go edition) – so just when you think it's at its best, it just keeps getting better.

review_text: Easy purchase, My laptop is fab

I bought this for my 78-year-old mum and she loves it, the features that come with it are much beyond what I expected, battery life is that of a nuclear submarine! I will be buying one for myself later this year. Cant say enough good things about it at the price
This a product good !
Excellent & very easy to use
Keep not let u answer calls and turn its self off too
It wasn’t easy finding a case for it though but the camera was good and it was easy for my dad to use.
Good phone, good quality for the price

This product is a low cost smartphone obviously, but it doesn't even process simple tasks.

My device just didn't charge battery and kept shuffling on/off charging sign with vibration.

Had a bad experience with this product. Maybe wasn't lucky enough and got a broken one.

Luckily returned it and got myself a other smartphone

Pros :- Well designed, easy to set up, easy to use

Cons :- None

Conclusion :- Great phone at a great price. Bought for a daughters birthday, she is very happy with it.

This is a terrible phone. It is very slooooow to react to button pushes and you have to wait too long to see if the phone will react to a selection. The screen goes blank whilst you are on a call and has to be awoken just to hang up. When answering a call you have to wait at least 3 rings to open the screen and answer the call. I wish I’d never bought it.
Good phone. Pleased with it.

Well worth the money.easy to set up.
Cant buy better than ARGOS.
Excellent does what you need to do good value for money
This is a competitively priced good smartphone, whilst not having all the bells and whistles of a Samsung or IPhone, would recommend for anyone who needs the basics but not be out of pocket.
still working it out the only fault i can find it is slow
My phone looks nice and shiny

I brought these phones for my sisters and they never stop thanking me. They features are great and the scream is clear. 
Thanks
Easy to use. Slimline
Stop working after two weeks. Had to bring back and get a refund.
Don't recommend this phone ,it stopped working a week and half after I brought it argos say u don't the refunds
This phone is very good , easy to use and a large visual screen , good value for the money
Keeps freezing all the time get something else.
nice phone thank you
Very simple and easy to set up and use

Bought this phone as a stop gap, however the performance speed is really bad in comparison to others I’ve had. There is alway a time lag, sometimes quite short, other times quite long. There were occasions when I was trying to open apps and it would up the wrong ones repeatedly. Not really sure why they are even allowing this phone to be sold, it’s so bad. Mine is going back to Argos.

Have had a Nokia once before,so this one was under par, only purchased it because of the removable battery.Least favourable phone ever.Way over priced, unusable, unresponsive,slow,the set up is complex,will only download updates via WiFi.What happened to a straight forward phones of latter yrs.
I purchased this phone for my daughter as she has just opened a bank account age 11 and needed Internet banking mobile app this phone works as it should and for the price tag its a bargain..
My son got this for his 10th birthday, he absolutely loves it and can do everything he wants to do on it example play games/ watch you tube / tik tok

Worked fine out of the box and seems to be a very good phone. The only issue we have had is that on the first charge, it would not switch back on. A quick web search revealed a soft reset option, no doubt already known to non-technophobe owners. This sorted the problem, but it has reminded us that my wife needs to charge it before it gets very low.
Great phone .dos what it's supposed to do , well worth the money
All we wanted from an entry level phone
I really doLove it ,it have a long battery life and it’s so reliable

For the price this phone is good. However, it is slow if you try and do more than one thing at once. Bought for my father who uses it to call and text and take the occasional photo, so it's absolutely fine. Would recommend for a similar user, not for a younger person who will want to browse the web, play games or go on social media.
Bought to replace existing one. Good allvroundcphone
Bought for a first time user and it was easy to set up and get all the apps that were needed.
Great little phone lots of features

Due to the low speed of this device, it doesnt respond in time for you to answer the call.
Further, it keeps rebooting, and therefore is not usable as a phone.
Bought this phone for mother after seeing all the review from other user  but im disappointed Keeps freezing,  slow.
wonderful phone so easy to use
The product works well.

Bought this for my mom to replace a Doro 8350.
This is perfect for her keeping in touch with everyone with calls, texts, emails, WhatsApp & Internet browsing.
Decent battery time.

Bought for 11 year old son who is tech savvy, we didnt want him to have a phone he could get addicted to so we went for a very average phone with average download speeds and this is exactly that. Seems very reliable and very good at what it does, but its just not quite responsive enough for gaming so it suits our needs perfectly.

I bought this phone on short notice as i needed a smart phone to replace a damaged one.
For a smart phone - its poor. Loading times for anything are shocking - including basic phone functions such as calls and SMS. It is so poor in fact that when the phone rings, it will invariably cut off before you get the chance to swipe the screen to answer. This is purely as a result of screen response time to the phones workings. 
i've given it two starts - because it does work - but would not recommend.
Battery life is so good on this easy to use.
Great phone drove it as it's easy to use and handle
Great phone. Feels nice. Removable back which feels oddly satisfying. Bought for a gift and was very well recieved. Does all the things you need for a budget smart phone you cant go wrong.

When I first opened be box I thought wow this is a great phone for the price.
Once I set it up it wasn't suitable for the amount of apps I use it started lagging a lot and I could barely use it.
The Screen is great quality and you get what you pay for.
Ideal phone for a basic user but not suitable for an intermediate or advanced user.
Brilliant little phone for the money, does everything you would expect from a phone in this price range.
Usual Nokia touch easy to use nice size   Good features very well happy with my purchase brilliant for the price

Avoid like the plague
Constantly freezing and 10 mins for a text to send
Taking it back tomorrow

I am Carer for my mum.I can't be without a reliable phone,I need to be able to contact her [especially during COVID.]No shops were open.I was scared I would be forced to buy a substandard mobile out of desperation.I was wrong.It has exceedingly long battery life.It's very user-friendly.It represents excellent value for money and the perfect size.The click & collect process was safe, staff still managed to be upbeat and positive. Argos really saved me,and looked after my Mum's best interests too!
dont buy this phone if you want a phone to use

Bought as a spare for work, does the job!
Considering the low price it has great battery life and a good clear screen

Decent mobile with a nice screen. 

Taking the back off to put in the battery and sim was awkward but not something I'll need to do often. 

Setup was 90% easy and 10% frustrating.

PHONE IS SO SLOW .TAKES A LONG TINE OPEN MESSAGES APPS  ETC
A;SO BATTERY IS SO SLOW

All great I bought the phone to send to Africa 
but I lost the receipt i  ned it please can you send me it to my email thank you
This is a good phone.  Easy to use.
easy to use looks good.
Total waste of time and money, crashes all the time, far to slow , screen doesn't always lite up and also can't always answer phone, I had to buy another phone.

It's awful tbh I got it for my 9 year old daughter just for her games and it won't load a single one just crashes and takes you back to main phone screen it hasn't been charged since the 1st use I'll probably sell it
Nothing to do with a smart phone . Is very poor quality
It was ready on time for collection as promised.
Great service at store would use click and collect every time

This phone is ideal. Really easy to set up and use. 
Does what is says. And plenty of updates available.
Keeps its charge. A good phone for the price
Basic smart phone does everything ok

Just bought new phone 2 weeks today, tried to contact argos last week by email telling them that it only worked for 3 days, very slow to switch on and power up, battery fully charged and keeps switching itself off, Had to switch it back on everytime I wanted to use it and missed dozens of calls, it switched itself off again last Thursday and wont come back on, email Argos wanting to return it for refund, no reply
awesome and satisfactory

Since purchasing this device it has crashed 4 times. It takes forever to update apps over wi fi  of course . I have had to restart  the device on numerous occasions since purchase because  it has been crashing . Makes me wonder what kind of operating system the device has . Camera resolution is awful and video playback in apps such as WhatsApp or Messenger is always lagging.
Bought this for my wife when her phone died. It’s a great example of a smart phone for a cheap price, lightweight, responsive, and just does all the basics you need it to do
Dont buy this it's too slow.

Bought this fir my daughter as her first touch screen(who has been using my iPhone for games ). Was expecting slow network for the price ... but in addition to that the touch screen Is very slow—- probably 10 generation primitive than any other modern phones .., display basic for the price ... should have paid £50 mire to get basic Samsung
Very good. I recommend it. But very difficult to open the phone
I love it its not a bad phone

First i find it very difficult to open, i needed to ask a friends help to open the back cover to put battery and sim card on, and even with my friends help he also struggled, then its quite slow to operate, guess im used to other phone but i find this slow, aside from that i guess with the price its a good phone to send message and call without looking too outdated.

I bought this for an elderly neighbour hoping that it would be easy to use...and indeed it is.
But it simply did not work!
On most apps the keyboard would not open so it made them impossible to use
At the moment have not set up the phone, so cant give any reviews .
Awful phone, looks cheap & is very slow.Only used it once then it was put back in the box.
Phone to slow .crashes all the time .would like a refund plz
Not good value ,very poor quality returned for refund
Do not recommend this for me it it's the slowest I've ever had
Quick to set up and start using. Good battery life. Perfect for a low(ish) cost phone for what I need it for.
Great cheap budget smartphone, but it lags a bit. Still a good buy though.

Got the phone as my old one broke, put the SIM card in, there are 2 SIM card slots, I tried both slots and it randomly kept losing signal.  The phone also kept getting very hot and battery lost its charge very quickly.   I returned this to the store and purchased a different phone a Motorola E6 which is much better.  I had no issues returning to the store, very impressed with Argos, I shop there all the time and will continue to shop there, just not impressed with the phone.
Really simple to use, stylish design and large screen really like the Nokia phones.
Screen is a good size and simple to use got it in black Friday deals so excellent price too.

After a few days, an update seemed to complete satisfactorily but I later I saw that the update had failed. Eventually, my daughter, who is more au fait with the technology, did a reset but the phone still failed to complete the update. 

I can give more details if required but, in the meantime, I will be seeking a refund in the next few days. Before I can do so, I have to try to extract my SIM card from the phone - no mean feat.

Brought to upgrade husbands old brick phone very nice but very hard to teach an old brick user how to use as not many instructions had to use online manual for him to read as wasn't listening to me trying to help him do things on it after reading the online manual instructions he can now make calls answer calls write texts and reply to texts and in a while I will help him with other things as giving him too much info in one go was confusing and now complains that his fingers are to big lol
It’s cheap but not as good as I think because while using the phone it’s gets freeze
brilliant phone for the money does what it needs to
Ok phone does every colour great camera very clear but runs very slowly
If you are looking for a smartphone that is easy to use and is using the latest Android allowing the download of most apps then look no further than this Nokia phone.
It’s for my son. So it is very good for his age. It has everything that smart phone has to have.

Good size phone, purchased as a Christmas gift for my father. When first started to set up the phone could not get into the back of the phone to put the battery and sim card in, was very stressful. 45mins later after wedging it badly with tools I managed to get it opened, left phone scratched but still okay for use. Easy to set up once the battery and sim got in. Wouldn't buy this phone again, so not worth the stress.
My new nokia is just perfect for me easy to use and looks good too would recommend for anyone looking for a simple but stylish mobile at a good price
The phone is ok to make calls and texts but it's slow for anything elase and it dont let you play some games or apps.
Ordered this for my wife to replace a 4 yr old phone had trouble transfering contacts &data from old phone  eventually managed to do it ,phone itself seems ok so far
Just simply too slow to use. Pay more and get a better phone
Excellent phone does all that's required and a great camera too .

Very old fashioned start, the battery is not integral and getting the case open was a challenge, once done however a very good solid budget twin sim smartphone.
My work needed a non-Chinese made phone and this fitted the bill very well.

Entry level smartphone. Does what android does, albeit not as swiftly as a higher spec one. Takes a memory card, which is good. Takes a second sim which is unusual for low spec. This is great for low use or if you have broken your best phone.
Great budget phone for my 11 year old daughter's first mobile phone. Has all the features she needs.
Fab phone, my 11yr old loves it
Beautiful product and great value
Bought this for my dad who had no interest in a flash phone and it does what it says. Does run slow but its a cheap phone so dont expect top end performance. Good clear screen.
Really hard to take the back off to get the battery in and keeps crashing while my daughter is playing on her game and runs really slow
It was a present for my mum who.loves it.Good size easy to navigate and great value for money.

There are no 'notification dots' on the main screen to tell you if you've received a text message, but there is on the notification screen. 

When you plug it into a PC the 'charging' link to turn on MTP for file transfer is hidden if the notification bar is too high OR too low, you have to mess about but you will find it. Also, to find the torch you first have to click the pencil on the notification screen and 'add' torch or whatever other icons you want to have there.

Easy to use Nokia 
16gb
Apps installed for ease of access 
Great phone with a good camera
Was sold a clearly pre-owned item which was faulty.
All i can say was outstanding service and my mum is over the moon with her Christmas present

I bought this cute phone for niece for Christmas.

Once we got past the hurdle of trying to open the back of the phone (be cautious if you have long nails) it was fine. Easy to set up being Android. 

My niece loves it!
Gteat phone as a starter phone a luttle slow but fine at the moment
Keeps turning off wen trying to answer calls and decides to do what it wants when it wao
Definitely well worth getting amazing price i would highly recommend
Brilliant simple smart phone
The phone let's us download the apps but then it wont let you open the apps.
I brought this is the black Friday deals. My son set it up easily and has been glued to it since! Good value for money for a teenager who has a habit of losing phones! Very pleased with this phone.
Great starter phone for my son can keep intouch with him all the time on way to school an onvway home

I bought this for my son as his first phone now that he walks home from school alone. It’s very user friendly and straightforward enough for him to work out how to use on his own after I set it up for him initially. I would recommend.
Don't buy this phone if you require any email, messages or browsing.
This phone is terrible. A waste of money.
Purchased for my husband who is a dinosaur when it come to mobiles he loves it easy to use would recommend it
It does what it needs to but the apps load really slow the battery doesn't last long & from unlocking the phone to actually speaking to the person it takes a good 3-4 minutes
This phone is great for taking pictures , holds it battery for a long time and is easy to use . I love it
Still familiarising myself with the phone but it seems to do everything I need.
Great phone and long battery life
Not very good product hard to get back off phone  to put battery would not recommend
Nice looking phone, good value for money

This is slow, freezes, does not load and constantly having to restart. The only good thing is battery life..once charged because that also takes an eternity. Did buy as a back up phone but not worth that. 
Worst phone I've ever had. Bought 2 of these for my husband too and his exactly same so it's not a one off
Unusable  ,almost  impossible  to release  the back  to put the  battery  in , Dont waste  your money
My phone is good looking and easy to use
Very good phone for that money
Great value and a nice wide screen. Easy to use and looks good
This phone is great value for money.  Easy to use looks good and good features. I would definitely recommend to others .
Excellent value with most of the features of more expensive brands, good styling and very easy to use.
Phone is a bit slow but for the price paid is great value for money. Good display and size is good for one handed use.

The price is good phone , the app are not bad , the main problem is back cover it’s very hard to open to put sim in , feel like your gonna break the camara lens , they haven’t made it easy to open , so I wouldn’t recommend it .
I've always been happy with Samsung phones and this one is no exception.
Care removing the back cover as your liable  to lift the glass and ruin the screen
High quality feel to the case and very clear screen. Android OS easy to use and fast response times. Super value.
Perfect for my sons needs. Great size and worth the money
Had a couple of mobile phones and always have problems setting up and using but this one is perfect.
It’s a top phone very easy to use,dose all the things a iPhone will do great camera good old Nokia
Got this phone for a Christmas present for my daughter. Can’t wait to see her face when  she gets it.
Fine phone for the price but a bit slow

Thought I was getting a black Friday bargain. I didn't realise it was cheap for a reason. 
Firstly it's plastic. Secondly it's so slow. It's OK as an entry phone for a child. But not for me. My husband is now using it to send and receive messages and phone calls. ..... I know that's what phones are for........

Good phone cheap and unlocked
Enough said
It very simple and easy to use. Camera is not that good and to open the back cover was a challenge but overall I would say everything else is good.

Not to easy to remove back to inert sim etc or may be it was my caution!!
nice phone
Ideal for my father in law as his first smartphone. Decent sized display screen and easy to use. However getting the back off to insert the battery and SIM card was a bit of s nightmare.

Great value for price
No downfalls at all

Brought this phone as a replacement as could not afford early upgrade on my contract and to be honest, it looks half decent and the battery life if really good but it is so slow to open apps and if you won't to play games, forget it, also every time I hang up from a call the phone restarts itself, so over all not a very good phone

Excellent value phone running Android 10. Would like to have more RAM to multitask. But ok for a second phone for daily outside use. Handling size perfect. I have used Nokia since my first Car phone in 1988, and wouldn't change.

Way too slow 
The worst mobile I ever bought 
Waste of money literally

Bought this for my brother as replacement for stolen Samsung - this is just as good but less than half the price of the Samsung!!
Very light but still good.

She is my first priority number..every time i called her it cut phone off..i needed a phone pronto...just for texts and calls ..unless its just a faulty phone..but even when i used it for all sorts personally i didn't like the phone..
Nice product at a good price.

No charger in box
Slow to upload would not recommend  it, use it for emergency calls  only
Good phone, works perfect. Very small memory,
Very easy to deal with and collect once purchased

This is a good basic  stylish snazzy phone  Very good battery life Nokia have always been known for having long lasting battery life and this phone doesn't  disappoint on that score. very easy to use and navagate through the phone basic theme and ringing features has Bluetooth and all the basic features you would want. Nice clear  good quality photos . The only issue was taking the back off to put the battery in as it was  a pain. Something Nokia need to work on. Overall a good basic phone.

Nice phone 
nice phone price as cheap feature more
Simple, clear, relatively easy to operate. A little annoying that alert spots don’t show on locked screen or home screen but otherwise ok.
I am very pleased with the phone , it was easy to understand and nice looking. battery life is very good all in all I am happy with it.
Bought this for my 10 year old daughter as a birthday present . Perfect for a first phone
Great for my grandson to watch is you tube video on would recommend
Bit slow but it does what it needs to do. Easy set up and easy to use. Great as a first phone for kids.
It's goog fhone what I want it
I would not recomend  for any one who is working on phone us is really slow .

I bought this for my wife. Her old Nokia phone (basic phone only) was starting to fail. I tried a few replacements but she was not happy any of them. I saw this phone in the catalogue and the price was the maximum I would pay for the use it receive. My wife is pleased with the PHONE. The other abilities will not be used unless the grandchildren get their hands on it.
Beautiful colour, very durable , easy on the eye , very easy to use , clear screen picture for use in apps and photos , battery life good ,

Bought it for my dad, for him it’s all good. Only issue I have is that when the memory is expanded is does not become one with the phone Internal memory instead everything is treated separately, therefore the internal memory gets full really quickly. But for my dad it is fine as he only use the phone for calls and occasionally WhatsApp

This mobile takes a long time to react to the touches. It is very slow in comparison to other mobile phons that I have had. It reminds me when dial up Internet connection was in use.
However, I like the design of it, and the colour. 
Shame about the 'speed'.
Good phone for price.  A little slow but full of features
Argos have constructed a great service for customers to minimise the risk of covid. The collection was most accommodating. Would definitely recommend the Nokia 1.3 aswell.
as usual excellent product from Argos
This phone doesn't let me answer phone sometimes
Loving this phone better than my old phone
Absolutely love this and easy to use
Value for money and works well
After an initial problem with the memory, which was sorted by the folk at my local store. I am totally happy with this phone. It does everything I ask of it.
Product  Value for the money
I am glad I purchased this phone it's great I love it
review text when sent please

The phone is a steady platform for the many games that my wife uses during the day, it has clear sound and graphics and fast responses, if I were to replace my phone I would buy another of these really fair priced nokias
Nice design, colour and good price, not in use yet - xmas gift for son. But I'm sure he'll be happy :)

Slowest phone ive ever owned, dont know if it is the operating system or the handset?
Bought it as a replacement, liked Nokia phones years ago, like android set up, but this is painfully slow at loading pages. You get what you pay for i suppose.
Great phone , loved it.
First smartphone easy to use
Unfortunately I had to return this item as I couldn't even remove the back to put the battery in. Rather than risk damaging it, I returned it for a refund
Easy to use and looks good. Very happy with purchase
The camera on this phone is really clear and takes good photo's,I think it is a good quality phone.
Great phone , not to difficult to work and feels light.

Does all the basics but can be very slow and the battery is unlikely to last more than a day of moderate use. Google assistant can become irritating as it cannot be fully turned off and has its own easily knocked button on the left side of the phone. Camera is good quality. Ok as a cheaper smartphone but would not recommend.
I am very disappointed with the phone it is too slow to process and has to ring at least four times before the person ringing is displayed and can be answered.
It’s brilliant product
Although slower than more expensive phones it has many features and easy set-up. Online Manual is a must to download. Suggest getting add'l  Memory card too.

Wanted a cheap, functional, simple to use phone as I do not live on my phone (text and ring rarely, use Facebook and Messenger a bit). Phone would not store my screen brightness, volume and some other settings - had to re-set them several times a day. Screen not very responsive particularly navigation buttons which had to be pressed  hard, slow to open Facebook (over 1 minute), slow to switch on.
Decided it was not very good or was faulty so returned it.
Not a lot to say at this price. A decent phone at a great price. Actually quite a bit better than I expected.
great phone easey to set up did not take long at all
Like the phone as I always use Nokia simple to learn and can send photos to lap top.

A budget phone that seems crammed with features - this model offers excellent value for the price I paid. Great for people who want a phone that does the basic things very well without spending a fortune. Delivery was very efficient.

Good basic phone. My only problem during the setup was getting the back off to insert the battery and sim. My finger nail failed to budge it, in the end I had to use a thin metal tape measure on the corners
It is a lightweight phone, transferring data from previous phone was fabulously easy - however it is pretty slow to open apps.
The phone is value for money, however difficult to get the back off to put the battery and sim in.
All the phone I ever needed
Very reasonable price for a smart phone

A good little phone if you are already savvy on how to operate a smartphone, but no so good for those that are new to this technology.  Don't like that the screen goes to 'sleep' almost immediately, even when on a call on the only way to bring it 'back to life' is by pressing the on/off button.  Bought as a gift and only changed from an old keypad phone as service provider sent a new sim card that wasn't compatible with the phone he had.  An okay phone if you want  something cheap and cheerful.
Not recommend, is too slow, is moving hard the screen.
super value ... very pleased

This is got to be the worst phone I ever brought. Bought this mobile for my mum who is in her 70s and she can use it perfectly well. She said the phone reception is a vast improvement on her previous phone and she uses WhatsApp a lot. She found this phone easy to use and perfect for her.

I couldn't use it because the battery comes seperately and it was impossible to remove the back to put it or a sim card in. I even watched an online video on how to do it but to no avail. Comments on the video indicated that it's a common proble, one guy saying that he eventually used a bottle opener to do it.
Looks good, but looks aren’t everything, this phone is all I could ask for and more, efficient easy to manage and beautiful what more needs saying. So glad I bought this phone
Great little phone for the price- bought as a temporary phone whilst mine was being repaired

The phone is amazing, it has so many features.
I am totally impressed it is a great item. The battery life is very good last me two days. The color is beautiful. Overall love the phone.

Sorry but this is the worst phone I ever had .. totally can't handle the apps and very slow. Should really be take back for a refund

is so slow its not worth the effort, only 1gig ram is so slow, and thats with no apps just nokia bloat ware , its the worlds most rubbish phone. Makes and receives calls ok, but that's all

Nice basic nokia smart phone made much better now that they are using android rather than Microsoft operating system.Battery life good,nice touch screen with decent resolution.

One has to guess that pressing a blue dot with spots gives access to the ability to dial a number. Could be much clearer .
Good phone goods service
I am very happy about the purchase, I do not see any downfall.
Very happy, a good first phone. Great battery life and has everything you need.

A fine smart phone for the money - jet plane travel around the world on the Internet at bi-plane price. As others report, getting the back off the phone seems a little tricky. Amazing value. The missus is really pleased.
Good value for money.  Does everything I need - and more- from a mobile phone.  It's neat and easy to use.

Old school phone...open the back and the battery and sim card go into back of phone..battery life good...light weight...good android for the price..bought for 60 year old and she loves it..easy to use..

Bought this to replace an older android smart phone, this Is a good looking phone and does everything I need and more. Very please so far.
My first 'smart' phone. I bought knowing it had limitations but for the price I paid I am sure it will suit me fine.

Bought to replace old phone which is used for my 2 sim cards from other country.

Good value for money.
Bought this to replace my wifes old phone and she is highly delighted. Does all she wants,txt,whatsap, BBC sport and it even makes calls!!
This is a fantastic phone, lots of features very long stand by and usage time, easy to use, camera takes top quality images.

If you're looking for a decent phone on a budget this is the one, its a good biuld, nice clear screen with most of the features you get on a mutch more expensive phone, only thing I didn't like is that you don't get ap notifications badges on android go

Not a very easy phone to open using the finger nails to insert the battery and cards. Apart from this it is not a bad price and generally works quite well using the internet if the WiFi is a good strong signal.
I don't know if this is a design fault but it's almost impossible to get the back off to put in battery or SIM card. Cut my finger in the process so returned to store and bought a Samsung instead.
VERY WELL MADE PHONE

Not happy at all with this phone, thought I was replacing with updated version of my existing Nokia phone. To start with it was a pain to open my last one just had 2 slots in the edge to insert sim and memory card simple, I have slightly damaged casing whilst opening, worked for a couple of days but now cannot connect with phone company nor wi-fi, seems to be over heating battery flat in just a few hours.
Looks good, easy to use, does what I need it for.

This is an Android 'GO' edition phone or 'Lite' as referred to by some APPS. This means that some functions and APPS may not be available to download/install. 'GO' was developed for emerging markets in the world, so has a lower price point and technical hardware. It's OS is Android 10 and is ready for 11 (due soon). It's not for the user who is playing games/surfing/videos etc. every minute. If you intend to make calls/text, check your kids face book, bank/bus times occasionally then it's fine.

Bought for an elderly relative with visual impairment because it has the Google assist button, all he has to do is press the button to wake the phone, swipe up to unlock, press the Google assist button and speak. With the contacts set up simply he can easily make calls using voice commands. Great for a cheap phone
The phone wars slow to do things and slow to open up, slow to write texts and slow reactions. When the phone got delivered, there was a chip in the beach of the case and the phone was so slow.
Does what I need it to do - good picture and video quality. Very slim and light. Love the colour (turquoise blue).
Don't use it much but when I do it's everything I need
Decent phone, functions well. Has designated google button to make commands
WE bought one of these for our caretaker at work - Is does everything we need a simple Smart phone to do!
Good mobile for the money. A little slow to respond to your actions but if you only use occasionally then it's fine and a good buy
great product for my mum has the basics easy to use but also good quality for those who do a bit more on it too

I bought this as a cheap emergency replacement so I wasn't expecting brilliant things but I did expect it to cover the basics. How wrong of me. The alarm will disappear for no apparent reason. I still haven't figured out how to answer WhatsApp calls and the browser crashes every two minutes - don't even think about trying to fill out a form or do some online shopping. The camera is nice but only takes pics some of the time. Don't waste your money.

Bought this after a good newspaper review, as my 1st step into smart phones (low level needs). Neither myself or a friend or 2 Argos shop assistants (yes 4 of us) could get the dam thing open to charge up the battery- so i got a refund. How ridiculous & a massive design fault - especially knowing it's aimed at those less I.T sassy. Waste of your time & money.
nice looking phone, slim, light nice colour, fast delivery

Very dissatisfied with this item, only had I for 10 hours then had to return it. Phone was faulty ,was unable to answer calls, and texts . Phone looked great until these issues started.

The phone was up and running within 30 minutes of delivery. It has proved easy to use for someone like me who is only interested in having an easy to use reliable phone. It is enough that I can use it for  the mainly basic communication and way-finding tasks that I need it for.
Good and easy to use

Easy to use, battery lasts quite long. My son loves it.

I would not recommend this phone to anyone, several people have posted negative reviews I was unable to remove the back of the phone to install the sim and the battery. The gentleman at the Argos store reluctantly credited my card. Sadly I don't think that I will be using Argos again

good allrounder,good value for money.

Wanted a basic 4g smartphone for my mum and this fit the bill. Opening the back of the phone to place sim card and battery in can be difficult. But the phone itself and it's features seem to be pretty good for the price.

The phone was advertised as network unlocked. Unfortunately EE said that the phone appears to be locked and they were not able to get it to connect to the network.

I took the phone back to the Argos store the next day to seek a refund, the assistant told me that they have a red flag on this product and it shouldn't have been sold to me.

The customer service was great and I was refunded without question.

However I am unsure why I was sold the product in the first place if it was flagged.

This item was a bit disappointing the face unlock camera is madoka and doesn't always work its also slow and closes apps and takes some time too respond, on a plus note i did find the camera pretty good with clear photos but i cant recommend it as its too slow, it needs more ram and im not a fan of android go its limited and you dont get all the features of android which is a shame and a bit of a pain, I really recommend that you pay another £30 or so and get something with full android.

the price is good but the phone is not it is not worth it the phone hangs freezes if u receive a call it takes time to show you are getting call doesn't show any notifications so overall the phone is no good waiting for argos to reopen so i can return it.

One draw back was to open the case to insert a sim I found this really difficult but got there in the end 10/10

Ordered this as an inexpensive emergency replacement for a broken phone, but I may just keep this. The specs aren't mind blowing but it uses Android Go, which is specifically designed for low end phones, and as such it's surprisingly fast given how little RAM this device has. It arrived same day, too, which was very much appreciated. Good little phone, and it doesn't weigh much either. All in all quite pleased with it.
good phone to start using touch screen  phone

As a budget phone, you shouldn't expect too much from this device.
If fully charged in the morn, the phone's battery will last until around 4pm until you have to charge again so be warned if you take on evenings out.
The apps are slow to load and often crash which makes tools like Google Maps and app banking very difficult.
If you use for too long, the device does overheat which in-turn, makes it even slower.
I did return the device as it was such poor quality.
you get what you pay for i use as emergency phone
For the price this is a very good phone. Set up was easy and since I've been up and running (2 weeks now) I've had no problems at all.
A nice android phone, works really well and easy to set up.
It's nice its light a good we phone
Very good for the price.
I had to return this phone as it was crashing. For the money it is fine for calls text and browse the internet. Once it had Facebook and what’s app after that crashed
Perfect for my 9 year old has all the stuff on it that's needed. Quite a good little camera

Bought this for my teenager when the last phone died. Not a great camera but the phone is good. Long battery life.

We bought this phone for our 2 boys to keep in contact with their friends. It is not the fastest phone but generally works well. It couldn't run Zoom very well, the video was sticking badly, but worked absolutely fine with Skype video calls. I have installed Google Family Link to control the use of the phone, which works fine. We did struggle to get the back cover off. Overall, good value for money.

LOOKS GREAT, WORKS GREAT (NOKIA KNOW WHAT THEY ARE DOING) BUT IT'S A SHAME YOU HAVE TO BEND THE BACK TO REMOVE IT (TO PUT BATTERY IN); WHY COULDN'T NOKIA STICK TO SLIP OFF BACKS LIKE THIER ORIGINAL MOBILES? Excellent phone choice, and easy to use.
simple to use smart phone looks and feels far more expensive.if your not bothered about playing games and youtube etc then this phone is ideal.

It is an easy and practical phone to use. The battery life is long and have essential features.

Good entry level phone

Brought this phone for my
 80 years old dad. It is easy for him to use.

I bought this item a month ago and use it as a secondary device. Dual SIM is useful to me,voice calls have a clear sound(which I need), baterry is strong enough to have calls for two days. I haven't used it for browsing,only for voice calls. Toughened screen is also a good option for money.
In general - worth money for budget and work phone.

Basic smart phone but excellent quality. Battery life lasts 2.5 days with WiFi & Bluetooth on. Charges quite slow so do overnight. Loud ringtone, 2 sim & 1 SD slot. Some functions limited to allow for budget like cant like/dislike YT vids. Great for 2nd/work phone needing internet access/WhatsApp. Dropped it alot, never broke. Has most smart phone functions or capabilities. Pic quality great but vid recording can be jumpy during but ok after. Phone can be slow if battery low so keep charged

This Nokia was bought as a first mobile phone for my daughter and has all the features that are needed.
Lovely sleek design, good value for money and happy child. Win win. 
I'd recommend.

Bought this for my gran so that she can use video call to keep in touch with us, I set it up for her and I was really impressed with it. It really is amazing for the price, nice clear screen with good cameras and storage space for apps ect. Only slight nag with this was trying to get the cover off, it took over ten minutes, there's no grove to put your fingernail into. Apart from that it is the best budget phone for its price! Thank you Argos for another great product and fast collection!
I would tell my mates to buy this phone easy to use
It's easy to work. It has some good standards apps.
Decent phone,easy to use
Good phone recommend
It works fine, good signal but sometimes freezes

Great service from Argos, smooth and efficient as expected. The phone however, is awful. It does everything needed, but at glacial pace. Battery life is good, all the features are there in Android, but too sensitive on phone calls, so frequently puts calls on hold or mute, and answering calls is sporadic, again due to the terribly underpowered processor. Opening any app is a test of patience, I'm just glad I only use it as a work phone.
Bought as a second backup phone and is excellent value for either a starter or backup. Good screen and storage.

When I purchased the phone I thought it was great. The sleek design and and latest updates I thought if was the perfect phone for my budget. When I went to install two apps on the phone that's when I realised the phone was starting to slow down. It has now come to a point there the phone is that slow going from app to app and general browsing , it's become unusable
This phone is extremely slow. It's taking ages to open an app, inbox or even contacts list. Calls are often getting disconnected after few minutes. Wouldn't buy it again

I got the phone to keep in contact with my grandparents on their last legs to make sure they have alarms to take tablets and eat and drink, they find it so easy to use for the age they are it’s a miracle.
Reach baseline of entry level phones.

This phone is easy to use as I couldn't get to a phone shop as were all in lockdown. I needed a phone to be able to face time my husband as he has an old phone . the phone is nota described which was charcoal, it dosn't seem to have the features claimed , i havn,tseen anywhere to sign in with my eye print a advertised & it says very quick start but it takes twice as long as my old phone. delivery was superb.

Fantastic phone for the price, has the usual smartphone features & current Android OS (10). Only downside is 1 GB RAM - sometimes this can hamper apps speed-wise, but other than that, if you only plan on doing a few things at a time, it's a fantastic phone.
I brought this for my mum for her birthday and it is great, works well, easy to use and great value for money.
